parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.05</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Difficulty </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> <template><title>Warning </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command is '''deprecated since Arma 3 1.58'''.</value></part></template><br> Since this version it always returns false. Use [[difficultyOption]] instead. See [[Arma_3_Difficulty_Overhaul|Arma 3 Difficulty Overhaul]] for further details.
<br>'''Former functionality:'''
Checks specific difficulty settings of the current user. Difficulty flag names can be found in the [[server.armaprofile|ArmA profile]] file under class Difficulties/xxx/Flags (xxx being regular or veteran).
<br>'''Note:''' stress damage for some reason is a separate difficulty so <tt>[[difficultyEnabled]] "stressDamageEnabled"</tt> might not return correct set value. There are however 2 dedicated commands for it:
* [[enableStressDamage]]
* [[isStressDamageEnabled]]
<br>'''Note:''' auto trim is also for some reason a separate difficulty so <tt>[[difficultyEnabled]] "autoTrimEnabled"</tt> might not return correct set value. There are also 2 dedicated commands for it:
* [[enableAutoTrimRTD]]
* [[isAutoTrimOnRTD]] </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''difficultyEnabled''' flagName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> flagName: [[String]] - difficulty flag name </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] ([[difficultyEnabled]] "armor");</code>  </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> List current difficulty settings:
<code>[[call]] {
	[[private]] ["_diff", "_cfg", "_flags", "_res"];
	_diff <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [];
	_cfg <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[configFile]] >> "CfgDifficulties";
	{
		_flags <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> _cfg >> [[configName]] _x >> "Flags";
		[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 0 [[to]] [[count]] _flags - 1 [[do]] {
			_diff [[pushBack]] [[configName]] (_flags [[select]] _i);
		};
	} [[forEach]] ("true" [[configClasses]] _cfg);
	_diff <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> _diff [[arrayIntersect]] _diff;
	_diff [[sort]] [[true]];
	_res <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[text]] "";
	{
		_res <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[composeText]] [_res, [[parseText]] [[format]] [
			"<t align<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>'left'>%1 - %2</t>", 
			_x, 
			[0, 1] [[select]] [[difficultyEnabled]] _x
		], [[lineBreak]]];
	} [[forEach]] _diff;
	[[hint]] _res;
};</code></value></part><part><name/>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[difficultyOption]], [[difficulty]], [[difficultyEnabledRTD]], [[Arma 3 Difficulty Menu]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
